name: Sunshine Flyers
about: Sunshine Flyers, located at the Auburn Airport just outside of Sacramento, California, is a premier flight school dedicated to providing exceptional flight training in a fun and supportive environment. We offer a range of instructional programs, including training for student, sport, and private pilot licenses, as well as specialized endorsements such as tail wheel training. Our FAA-certified instructors are known for their expertise, knowledge, and can-do attitude, ensuring an enjoyable and comprehensive learning experience. With a focus on safety and personalized instruction, Sunshine Flyers is the ideal choice for those aspiring to achieve their aviation goals. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced pilot, we pave the way to whatever path in aviation you are trying to achieve.
